text: Arrā koso wa, maruyamu no ko masu~īfudearu.' To iu mono wa, tashikani fushinjin-shadearu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Dare ga arrā ni taishi, sukoshidemo-ryoku ga arou ka. Moshi kare ga maruyamu no ko masu~īfu, sono haha to chijō no subete no mono o horobosou to o kangae ni nara retara, dare ga seishi dekiyou.' Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono wa, arrā no taiken ni zokusuru. Kare wa o kangae ni nara reta mono o sōzō nasa reru. Arra ― wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara reru
